title: OLD LEAGUE MOD/IDEA/SKINS
body: I really do miss the Sion and Nasus, they were like the Arnold Schwarzenegger and Morgan Freeman of league. If there was a mod or something that could make you look and sound like the old league champions (only you can see and hear) that would be amazing. Maybe even some more traditional skins would be cool. Keep in mind the abilities would look like the updated version which might look a bit weird but this is just an idea!

replies.body: Yes and please bring unchained {{champion:12}} to OCE please D:
